Shop Reconciliations <Realemirates.shopreconciliations@chalhoub.com>; UAE Leasing <uaeleasing@chalhoub.com>; Rent <Rent@chalhoub.com>; Retail Operations CGR <Retail.Operations.CGR@chalhoub.com>

Date: 2025-09-11 10:54
Subject: Re: Re: RSO UAE - STORE OPENING - PROJECT UPDATES | (Penhaligon's Boutique - Al Jimi Mall - Al Ain City) - [#REQ-1526140]
--------------------------------------------------
Hi Retail Operations UAE,

Ticket: https://onereach.chalhoub.com/helpdesk/tickets/1526140


Noted. We will provide any required documents needed from our side.

Regards,

	On Wed, 10 Sep 1:37 AM , Retail Operations wrote: 


	Dear All,

	Project updates.
	 
	Kindly be informed that we have Opening of " Penhaligon's Boutique - Al Jimi Mall "The tentative of the unit handover on 20 th Sep and opening date on 25 th Sep 2025.
	 
	To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification. 
	
	
	Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task. 

	@Elaine Petonio <mailto:Elaine.Petonio@chalhoub.com>   please assure that cleaning service agreement is signed and approved . 

	@Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com> please ensure that Civil Defense and Fire Fighting/Safety and Security issued & archived.

	@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  Please ensure that two manual invoice books and the CC machine have been transferred to the Abu Dhabi office. .
	 
	@Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  please ensure that CCTV has been installed and tested.

chunks.text:
, UAE Leasing , Rent , Retail Operations CGR 
	Subject: Re: RSO UAE - STORE OPENING - PROJECT UPDATES | (Penhaligon's Boutique - Al Jimi Mall - Al Ain City)
	
	
	Dear All, 
	
	
	Project updates. 
	 
	Kindly be informed that we have  Opening of " Penhaligon's Boutique - Al Jimi Mall - Al Ain City  "The tentative of the unit handover on 20th Sep  and opening date on 25th Sep 2025.
	 
	To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification. 
	 
	Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.  
	 
	@Elaine Petonio <mailto:Elaine.Petonio@chalhoub.com>   please assure that Cleaning service agreement is signed and Pest control agreement is signed.
	 
	@Shibu Janardhanan <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>   please ensure that AMC certificate, civile defense certificate is ready.
	 
	@Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>   please ensure that Trading license is issued & archived.
	 
	@Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>   please ensure that CCTV maintenance agreement is signed.

	@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  please ensure that Cash collection service agreement is signed.
	 
	@Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>   please support with all insurance certificates.
	 
	 
	Best regards, 
	Retail Operation UAE 





________________________________

	From: Retail Operations UAE 
	Sent: Wednesday, July 23, 2025 8:34 AM
	To: Amira ALI KHAMIS ; Mohammed AL-AREQI ; Elaine Petonio ; Hagop Ghazarian ; Connie Madeira ; Shibu Janardhanan ; Sreeraj Prakasam ; Sreejith Nair ; Siju Susammalalachan ; Ahmed Eltahan ; Philip Abdou ; Group Security Control Room ; Ghouse Khan ; Mohamed Rauf ; Jayesh Jayadevan ; Faisal Abdukunju ; Tojo Jose ; Sredha Mathai ; Fadi Alassadi ; Faisal JAMALI ; Pierre BAA SOLO ; Kaiser Amin ; Siddharth Sundararaman ; Farman Hussain ; Gaurav Bawa 
	Cc: Mary Janice Dofeliz ; Government Affairs ; Rami Riman ; May Karaki ; Joe Hobeika ; Kaiser Amin ; Siddharth Sundararaman ; Sayed Mahmood ; Retail Maintenance ; Rawad Hossein ; Joseph Diaz ; Prathap Pandiyan ; Alma Quinto ; Ali Beyyumi ; Dana Dadoush ; Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution ; Real Emirates Shop Reconciliations ; Retail Accounting ; UAE Leasing ; Rent ; Retail Operations CGR ; Retail Operations UAE 
	Subject: RSO UAE - STORE OPENING | (Penhaligon's Boutique - Al Jimi Mall - Al Ain City)

chunks.text:
op Reconciliations ; Retail Accounting ; UAE Leasing ; Rent ; Retail Operations CGR ; Retail Operations UAE 
	Subject: RSO UAE - STORE OPENING | (Penhaligon's Boutique - Al Jimi Mall - Al Ain City) 

	Dear All, 
	Hope you are doing well, 
	  
	Please be informed that we are opening Penhaligon’s Boutique that is going to trade in Al Jimi Mall - Al Ain City tentatively on 26th September 2025 TBC. 
	  
	We have prepared the Store Opening checklist for this store to ensure completion of all tasks. Each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on-time. 
	  
	A Microsoft meeting invitation will be sent shortly to discuss the opening preparations and the assigned tasks, please ensure you attend. 
	  
	For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach the designated Local Ops, Mohamed Bata; 050 815 8454, Khaled Mostafa 050 970 6657 any time. 
	  
	All the best,  
	Retail Operations UAE 
	  


	Disclaimer
	The information contained in this communication from the sender is confidential. It is intended solely for use by the recipient and others authorized to receive it. If you are not the recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution or taking action in relation of the contents of this information is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful.
